enchantment.qu-enchantments.freezing_asp: Causes a mob to slow when hit with this item.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.leeching_asp: Gain some heath when used to attack a mob.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.shaped_glass: Massive increase to damage dealt, but the item will take more damage in return.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.nightblood.d: Hello. Would you like to destroy some Evil today?
enchantment.qu-enchantments.molten_walke: Hardens lava under the player into hot obsidian.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.skywalker.de: Condenses a cloud under the player, but they must remain crouching.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.bashing.desc: Causes knockback to enemies when they hit your shield.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.speed_blessi: Gain a small passive speed boost.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.regeneration: Gain a small passive boost to natural regeneration.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.aggression_b: Gain a small passive boost to attack speed.
enchantment.qu-enchantments.essence_of_e: Chance for an enemy to randomly teleport away when they attack you. While wearing, water has a chance to teleport and harm the wearer. Corrupts all thorns enchantments.
